analysis.description:
MatchingMarket._buys (/unique_chucks/1/0x39755357759ce0d7f32dc8dc45414cca409ae24e.sol#995-1021) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == offers[id].pay_amt

MatchingMarket._buys (/unique_chucks/1/0x39755357759ce0d7f32dc8dc45414cca409ae24e.sol#995-1021) uses a dangerous strict equality:

SimpleMarket.buy (/unique_chucks/1/0x39755357759ce0d7f32dc8dc45414cca409ae24e.sol#373-419) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(uint128(spend) == spend)
	- quantity == 0 || spend == 0 || quantity > offer.pay_amt || spend > offer.buy_amt
	- offers[id].pay_amt == 0

elements.expression: quantity == 0 || spend == 0 || quantity > offer.pay_amt || spend > offer.buy_amt
